reviews.review: L4d1 primer contacto , fue una experiencia buena recordando mi infancia con varios cambios eso si este juego tiene mas desventajas que el otro pero se le perdona por ser un juego del 2008.

Great game its pretty cool how their are still people that play this game and its really fun to play online or with friends on this game Left 4Dead is a game worth buying. As well as Left 4 Dead 2 overall both are pretty cool.
虽说是经典之作，但由于初代版本引擎的原因，画质、画风这些总是玩起来不太舒服。本人在打出这段评测时依然处于3D眩晕状态。。。。。
다시 하고싶어서 샀는데 컨텐츠부족으로 좀하고 질림ㅋ 첨엔 오랜만에 하서 재밌었음

玩 L4D1 不如玩  L4D2
整合了1代的全部内容
但是，没有1代，哪来2代？
好评送上

[h1] 吐槽	[/h1]
	1代接近鬼服
        1代电脑AI是蠢的无可救药
        1代没有近战武器，这可是尸潮杀手
        1代没有jocker和changer,特感相对容易应付  
	1代地图色调偏暗
Still one of the best multiplayer games.
really good game, I like zombies so this was a good choice, is a bit scary at times if you wernt expecting it, but still really good
One of the best zombie games ever made, after all these years, the games is still awesome to play.
este juego es genial para jugar con tus amigos y divertirse un rato.Ademas las campañas son excelentes y cada modo de juego es interesante
Great game, but you basically get this game's entire compaign and characters + more if you buy L4D2
Muy buen juego, es indicado para pasar el rato
realmente é um jogo muito bom, recomendo tanto o 1 como o 2, ambos são divertidíssimos e tiram várias horas de gameplay!! (recomendo a vocês que joguem com amigos.)
un gran juego espero left 4 dead III :3

Ayyy nigdy w to nie grałem ale i tak miałem masę zabawy z nieznajomymi D:
Пожалуй самая затягивающая игра моего времени! Хороший сеттинг, геймплей, грамотная планировка игр и атмосфера, все это делает эту игу чуть ли не лучшей среди кооперативных шутеров.
Jogo bom pelo que joguei ate agora. estou gostando não tenho o que reclamar. é um jogo que recomendo um otimo passa tempo ;)
Приобрел с хорошей скидкой. Игра забавная. постреляться можно!
Первая часть намного лучше,старенький движок,мне нравится этот гейм
One of the greatest games I ever played.

从游戏本身来说不如二代性价比高
但是一代点附加内容可以看到开发团队解说等有趣的东西，就当是一份求生之路2开发纪实吧
有意思的是valve花了大量精力研究场景光影和游戏节奏，制作名单却只是个白模都没做完。
良心的valve
Игра, для тех кто умеет стрелять по зомбакам, достойная игра года :)
无可挑剔的游戏！[spoiler]最重要是便宜！便宜！便宜！便宜！重要是要说四次！[spoiler]
неплохой шутер с зомбями особенно если играть с друзьями(б"я у моих друзей нет l4d)
Me parace un juego muy atractivo y divertido de juagr con amigos

"Clássico é clássico e vice-versa"

Left4dead deveria ser um patrimônio cultural tombado pelo Steam. Um jogo obrigatório para iniciantes no Steam.

Não espere um Resident Evil: os zumbis aqui são corredores! Ótima pedida para jogar com os amigos.

Contra: Seu sucessor, L4D2, possui gráficos melhores e mais recursos de jogo. Mas somente o primeiro inicia o player nesse mundo novo.

This was the first game that I received with my first Xbox 360 as a gift from my dad back in 2008 and after logging 200+ hours on console, it easily remained as one of my favorite franchises over the years. I have so many fond memories playing this game with my buddies over Live and I think the experience was enhanced as it was my first time playing video games online. Great game with a great story and fun multiplayer. Kinda sad to see that this game was abandoned for L4D2.
Me parece un juego bien shidori :)
this game so amazing thx gaben newell i love this game l4d1 is amazing
Muito bom, e barato fica melhor.
Gerçekten güzel bir oyun herkeze tavsiye ederim arkadalarınızla sabahlara kadar oynayacağınız oyunlardan birisi de left 4 dead bu serinin  2. de var fakat ben indirmedim onuda deneyeceğim
Left 4 Dead  top game in ze world .

PUNCH, PUNCH, PUNCH, ME UP AND FUCK,FUCK, FUCK ME UP
GRAB, GRAB, GRAB ME UP AND SMOKE, SMOKE,  SMOKE ME UP
Still so much fun with friends.
i like the second one more, but this game is still good/

Um dos melhores coops já feitos para computador. Esse jogo é atemporal, não importa se ele é antigo, pois a diversão é sempre boa. Variedade de armas, mapas e inimigos. Recomendo fortemente jogar com amigos. Comunicação facilitada, pois permite tanto via teclado, como por voz e até mesmo comando já prontos onde a CPU, em jogos solo, interage. Pra mim um dos melhores jogos da Valve quando se trata de coops, pois no multiplayer o clássico Counter Striker ganha.
The is fast paced, and very addicting, but the multiplayer is basically dead as of now, and playing with bots is fun, but not like playing with real people. So, thats sad. :(
одна из лучших игр в которые я играл

Если хотите вспомнить детство, весело провести время, а где-то и пощекотать свои нервишки настолько, что пот будет стекать с ваших ладошек постоянно, то эта игра для вас.
Нестареющая классика, со своей графикой, настроем и атмосферой дающая фору многим современным зомби-слещерам и по сей день.
Проиграв в нее более года на пиратке, с уверенностью могу сказать, что эта одна из лучших игр про "зомби" за все время, к тому же имеющая отличную вторую часть.
Однозначно рекомендую!

Played this with my roomate in Iraq on a rigged as hell LAN setup...BEST way to kill time between duty shifts. Graphics aren't on par with the new systems but they're more than adequate for the style of game this is. Conserve your ammo for the hordes or you'll get mowed down in a few seconds.

Jogo muito bom recomendo.... mesmo com duvida qual pegar entre o left 4 dead 1 ou 2 me surpreendi muito com esse jogo sem ao menos avaliar o segundo  game, principalmente a jogatina ser muito boa é dificil de-se enjooar mas fica mais empolgante jogando multiplayer ai já é outro patamar, recomendo muito  esse game.
<3
Cok iyi oyun lan korkunc deil pek
Это самая шикарная игра про зомби. Много разных уровней и интересный сюжет. СОВЕТУЮ ВСЕМ!!!!!!
Bought it on release. Just as fun as the day I bought it.

Great for online co-op with friends.
I prefer it over L4D2.
